item.title: Yarn Install
item.description: env mac book air step 安装 yarn ➜ tomtsang-rootsongjc-cheatsheet git:(master) brew install yarn Updating Homebrew... ==> Auto-updated Homebrew! Updated 2 taps (caskroom/cask, homebrew/core). ==> Updated Formulae abcmidi braid cryptopp exiftool fdroidserver glbinding haxe pwntools x265 alot cgrep erlang fbi-servefiles freexl graphene miniupnpc ranger ==> Downloading https://yarnpkg.com/downloads/1.3.2/yarn-v1.3.2.tar.gz ==> Downloading from https://github.com/yarnpkg/yarn/releases/download/v1.3.2/yarn-v1.3.2.tar.gz ######################################################################## 100.0% 🍺 /usr/local/Cellar/yarn/1.3.2: 14 files, 3.9MB, built in 40 seconds ➜ tomtsang-rootsongjc-cheatsheet git:(master) 使用, 安装工程中的依赖包 ➜ tomtsang-rootsongjc-cheatsheet git:(master) yarn install yarn install v1.
